mapper.select: select count(1) from t_b_storage t1 left join t_Warehouse t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id where 1=1

select t1.id,DATE_FORMAT(t1.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createtime, t1.houseid,DATE_FORMAT(t1.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d') modify_time, t1.note,t1.modify_userid,t1.modify_username, t2.name housename from t_b_storage t1 left join t_Warehouse t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id where 1=1
order by t1.houseid asc,t1.modify_time desc limit #{start},#{end}
mapper.insert: insert into t_b_storage_items ( storageid,supplierid,itemid, item_num,item_num2,item_weight, item_dj,item_je,item_note ) values ( #{storageid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{supplierid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{itemid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item_num,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item_num2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item_weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item_dj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item_je,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item_note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_b_storage set houseid=#{houseid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, note=#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time=STR_TO_DATE(#{modify_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), modify_userid=#{modify_userid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, modify_username=#{modify_username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t1.id,DATE_FORMAT(t1.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') createtime, t1.houseid,DATE_FORMAT(t1.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d') modify_time, t1.note,t1.modify_userid,t1.modify_username, t2.name housename from t_b_storage t1 left join t_Warehouse t2 on t1.houseid=t2.id where t1.id=#{id}

select t1.*,t2.name suppliername,t3.name itemname,t3.model,t4.name manuname from t_b_storage_items t1 left join t_Supplier t2 on t1.supplierid=t2.id left join t_item t3 on t1.itemid=t3.id left join t_Manu t4 on t3.manuid=t4.id where t1.storageid=4 order by t1.id asc
